name: Double Cheeseburger Recipe
description: Master the art of the classic Double Cheeseburger with this quick and easy recipe.
keywords: Double Cheeseburger, Burger Recipe, Homemade Burger, Easy Dinner, Family Meal
recipeIngredient: Lettuce for topping, washed and dried

recipeInstructions.name: Form patties
recipeInstructions.text: Divide the beef into 8 equal portions and form each into a thin patty slightly larger than your bun. Season both sides with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.name: Cook patties
recipeInstructions.text: Heat a pan or grill on medium-high heat. Add the vegetable oil. When it's hot, cook the patties for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until nicely browned. Place a slice of cheese on 4 of the patties during the last minute of cooking to let it melt.

recipeInstructions.name: Toast buns
recipeInstructions.text: Toast the burger buns lightly on the pan for a minute or until they are slightly crispy.

recipeInstructions.name: Assemble burgers
recipeInstructions.text: To assemble the burgers, spread a teaspoon of mustard and ketchup on the bottom halves of the buns. Then, place a slice of cheese-covered patty on each, followed by a second patty.

recipeInstructions.name: Add toppings
recipeInstructions.text: Top the patties with finely sliced onions, 2 pickle slices per burger, and lettuce. Cap with the top bun.

recipeInstructions.name: Serve
recipeInstructions.text: Serve your double cheeseburgers immediately for the best taste. Enjoy your homemade masterpiece with your favourite side of fries or a fresh salad.
